alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 3:55PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central and southeastern Leon County through 430 PM EDT... At 355 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tallahassee Comm College, or near Tallahassee, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Ralford Greenway, Macon Community Park, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Eight Mile Pond, Lake Ella, Tallahassee Mall, Tallahassee Regional A/P, State Capital Complex, Governors Square Mall and Natural Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
